WorkItem.Description:
To support the implementation of graphs that support nodes with unique identifiers, please add events including
 
OnBeforeVertexAdded
OnBeforeVertexRemoved
OnBeforeEdgeAdded
OnBeforeEdgeRemoved
 
in appropriate locations and to allow for the cancellation of the related operation based on the vertex/edge and the existing graph.

Comments.Message: I would suggest a patch, but I can't get into the repository.
Could you give me a scenario where those would be useful? You can always test for the vertices before trying to add it?
Well, then you couldn't package up the functionality.  The callers would have to agree on a protocol for this- You could wrap it all in another class, I guess, but that's much more code.
Oh, and the scenario is graphs that support nodes with unique identifiers.
